name: SNAKES (in space)
description:
Howdy all!

     This is my first game and first game using the bitsy editor (you can see it by clicking here) it is a very short games with what you could consider to be three endings, which I may update to give a lot more, but that's after I learn more about HTML5 and such; hopefully you'll like this little endevour of mine and find it funny too!

     (also just treat the down arrow as the dialogue/text complete button, I had to circumnavigate a limit in the game engine to deliver a joke I wanted to)
